name: Screw Hit!
description:
The game I published on Google Play Store in September, 2021.

There are 6 different hammer and drill skins and backgrounds in this game.

Working advertisement and in app purchase system.

Special code written for controlled randomness used for passing background objects, the band and items on it.

It took 3 years in total to complete this game, it is not a fast development for such simple game but considering the external factors for that time period of my life and learning about making games and different game features which are not even used in this game was an experience which can't be measured by time and I am proud of creating my first game, even if it is not the best game, it is the first step to create the best game of my life.

Special thanks to Görkem Öztaş and Alp Erkmen Uzun for their support.
